## Purpose

Export population at parish level to match to first-stage

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df_reg <- read_rds(here::here("data", "clean_data", "df_ref.rds"))

df_reg %>% 
  count(scbkod) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  mutate(ref_code = case_when(
    nchar(scbkod) == 5 ~ str_c("SE/0", scbkod, "000"),
    TRUE ~ str_c("SE/", scbkod, "000")
  )) %>%
  distinct() %>% 
  write_csv2(here::here("utils", "population_by_parish_1930.csv"))

```
